mapper.insert: insert into t_cart (cart_id, user_id, product_id, cart_quantity, cart_date) values (cart_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{cart_quantity}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_quantity, p.product_id, i.product_img, c.user_id, c.cart_id, c.cart_quantity from t_product p join t_cart c on p.product_id = c.product_id join t_product_img i on p.product_id = i.product_id where c.user_id = '${user_id}' order by c.cart_id asc
